findings.details: Daily news posts continue using consistent inline thumbnail styles and responsive layout.
Manual scan of recent posts and pages found no placeholder or invalid domains.
Inline news images in 2026-02-05 daily post lacked lazy-loading and alt attributes; source label mismatched domain.
One summary had a truncated opening word and a missing contextual summary line for a column link.

recommendations: Normalize inline news images with lazy-loading and consistent classes
Fix mismatched source labels and add concise summaries for opinion links
